Episodes.Title: Domestic Disturbance
Episodes.Plot: Ruth returns from Thailand to a smart-arse encounter at the airport with Levi, who she doesn?t know. Her brother Daniel is deeply affected by a hit-and-run incident, on the anniversary of their father?s death. Isobel gently rejects Daniel?s attempt to inject ?spontaneity? into their relationship while Levi breaks into the flat and Neru struggles to deal with an oversized corpse.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Sex scenes, violence, drug use and offensive language

Episodes.Title: Misconduct
Episodes.Plot: Isobel attempts to warm things up in the bedroom, but Daniel?s performance is affected by guilt. When Ruth?s memories drive her to save the world, her good cop/bad cop routine puts Neru in a compromising position.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Sex scenes, violence, drug use and offensive language

Episodes.Title: Flight Risk
Episodes.Plot: It?s Neru?s birthday, but he?s not in a party mood after causing a death. Isobel and Daniel also have blood on their hands. Levi meets Jacob and has a violent confrontation with his past. Ruth?s attraction to Levi grows, but how long will he stick around?
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Sex scenes, violence, drug use and offensive language

Episodes.Title: Restitution
Episodes.Plot: Daniel has an unusual proposition for the grieving Mia, but who is he really helping? Isobel and Daniel plan their engagement party. Neru?s Good Samaritan act backfires, and he begins to suspect that Levi?s not the ideal flatmate.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Sex scenes, violence, drug use and offensive language

Episodes.Title: Just Cause
Episodes.Plot: Isobel revisits Daniel?s big night out and raises the stakes on her latest case, but the stress is getting too much for her. Neru splashes out on an image upgrade. Ruth gets a shock and Levi?s relationship with Jacob is on the rocks.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Sex scenes, violence, drug use and offensive language

Episodes.Title: Release
Episodes.Plot: Ruth deals with her guilt. Isobel and Daniel want all their secrets aired, but is Isobel prepared for what Daniel has to tell her?  Neru struggles to keep his anger in check. Levi and Nick get a new business partner ? a dangerous move.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Sex scenes, violence, drug use and offensive language

Episodes.Title: Fleeing the Scene
Episodes.Plot: As the flat counts down to a big event, Neru challenges Levi, Jacob goes missing, Daniel disappears on Isobel and Ruth loses somebody important.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Sex scenes, violence, drug use and offensive language
